items.title: Best decision I made
items.body: Frank Cece was incredibly knowledgeable and provided an excellent defense for my unusual and somewhat complicated case...

items.title: Worth the wait
items.body: This case was a process... After three hours of deliberation the verdict came in not guilty...

items.title: Singleton / Sargent Family Review
items.body: I was going through a difficult child custody battle... we won...

items.title: Very Satisfied Client
items.body: During our consultation it was easy to see that he would be the perfect attorney...

items.title: Superb Lawyer
items.body: I was facing 8 years... I received TASC probation...

items.title: Expungement
items.body: Mr. Cece expunged my criminal record...
